name: Golf Daisuki! O.B. Club
overview: A fun, four-player isometric mini-golf video game that will present the expected challenges of perfectly hitting the ball at the exact power and precise angle. Released as digital download using the satellital modem Satellaview device. Unlike other lower category downloads, it is a complete game that despite its high quality, hasn´t been distributed on a cartridge. It has been recently translated to English by fans.
